籤詩版本二:
Kuphatikizika kwa yin ndi yang kumatsimikiziridwa ndi kumwamba.” Mkazi akakwatiwa ndi mwamuna, amakhala banja losangalala.
Koma akuwona chinjoka ndi njoka zikukumana, Xiong Zhen alowa mu orchestra yamaloto ndikulumikizananso.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ikuyimira kuphatikiza kwa Yin ndi Yang ndi Dao.
Zonse zikuyenda bwino.
解曰: Tsatirani mtima wanu. Ukwati ndi mimba. Chuma chopindulitsa. Zothandiza kwambiri ku mbozi zam'munda.
籤詩故事一:
◇Li Dan ndi chinjoka ndi phoenix amagwirizana
Li Dan anakhala Ruizong wa mzera wa Tang, Wu Zetian anakwera pampando wachifumu, ndipo mfumuyo inatsitsidwa kukhala munthu wamba ndipo anakhala kumidzi, anakumana ndi Hu Fengjiao ndipo anakwatira. Malinga ndi nthano za anthu, aŵiriwo anachotsa pa lamba wa mwana wosabadwayo hafu ya sikweya chidindo.
(Chinjokacho chimaimira Ruizong, ndipo phoenix chimaimira Hu Fengjiao. Zikutanthauza kuti ukwati umatsimikiziridwa ndi kumwamba.)
聖意: Chitetezo chapakhomo, kudzikonda, chuma, bizinesi, ukwati, Liujia, amuna oyenda pansi m'minda, mphutsi za silika zimatukuka, nyama zimatukuka, kufunafuna anthu, milandu imalungamitsidwa, kusamuka kumayenda bwino, katundu wotayika amapezeka, matenda amakumana, zabwino. mankhwala amapezeka, mapiri ndi manda ndi mwayi
古人: Li Dan chinjoka ndi mgwirizano wa phoenix
第X籤: Lowani pa makumi awiri ndi chimodzi
